meaningMnemonic: The <radical>grain</radical> stuck in your <radical>cleat</radical> had a <radical>former</radical> life. In that life it was a <kanji>rice plant</kanji>. It was a happy little rice plant, minding its own business, when it was yanked up and cleaned up and put in a bag for people to buy and cook and eat. That was so long ago. Now it's just a sad grain in the bottom of your shoe.
readingMnemonic: The grain of rice, as it thinks about its <kanji>rice plant</kanji> life too, mutters, "<reading>いな</reading>、<reading>いね</reading>." Yes little grain, it was a really nice life. I'm sorry.
